channel.title: How to get this client running?
channel.description:
Hi, i've stumbled across this, could someone tell me how to run the client attached in this topic please?
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,253949.0.html
it mentions compiling and creating a data folder, which i've done both, The client runs but I get an error screen,
"Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading RuneScape To fix this try the following (in order):
1: Try closing ALL open web-browser windows, and reloading 2: Try clearing your web-browsers cache from tools->internet options 3: Try using a different game-world 4: Try rebooting your computer 5: Try selecting a different version of java from the play-gay menu"
Any ideas?

item.title: How to get this client running?
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

Hi, i’ve stumbled across this, could someone tell me how to run the client attached in this topic please?

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

it mentions compiling and creating a data folder, which i’ve done both,
The client runs but I get an error screen,

"Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading RuneScape
To fix this try the following (in order):

1: Try closing ALL open web-browser windows, and reloading
2: Try clearing your web-browsers cache from tools->internet options
3: Try using a different game-world
4: Try rebooting your computer
5: Try selecting a different version of java from the play-gay menu"

Any ideas?
